title: Intense Repair 88% Lactic Acid Peel with Free Fan Brush - Unbuffered Professional Grade - Revive Sun Damaged Skin Quickly
description:
Skin Smoothing: When applied to the skin, it works to remove dead skin cells and leaves the skin glowing and radiant. Diminishing fine lines and wrinkles.

Reverses Sun Damage: Lactic acid can work to soothe sun damaged skin by making wrinkles less noticeable and pronounced.

Treats Hyperpigmentation:Splotchy pigmentation, brown marks and age spots are common skin problems, however using lactic acid peels can help treat these conditions by lightening the skin overall and creating a more even complexion.

Helps Smooth Scars: If you have a scar on your face or roughened acne scars, lactic acid peels can create a more even texture and smooth out keratinized skin, making pits and dents appear shallower.

Improves Acne: In most cases, acne can be improved by lactic acid peels. In a sense, it presses the reset button on your skin and creates a more even texture and balanced surface. So, trying to maintain a balance between oily and dry skin becomes less of an issue.

title: LTop eyelash 10 Pairs of Reusable Natural and Regular Long False Eyelashes
description: Features :- Carefully design, simple to use and comfortable to wear- Cross style, make you more attractive, charming , fashion and chic- 10 pairs of false eyelashes in one package- Easy to remove by eye make up remover- Suitable for professional use or nonprofessional useUsage Instructions :-Carefully remove the eyelashes from the case with tweezers.-Compare false eyelashes with your eyeliner length, trim to suitable length and width if necessary-Add glue along the false eyelash root with cotton bud.-Hold the eyelash on the root of your natural lashes with pressure-If necessary, apply eye shadow or eyeliner to make your eyeliner look more naturalCustomer Service :-Any questions, Freely contact LTop Team through Amazon message. Thank you!Please click on our storefront or search LTop Eyelashes for more choice of False Eyelashes.
